content.raw:
I'm having this problem too. I also noticed I can't get around it by building gazebo from source as the cmake config is hard-wired to reject Ogre above version 1.8.9. 

[Issue 996](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/996) is cited for the version restriction but there has been no activity on the issue since it was reported 5 months ago.
content.html:
I'm having this problem too. I also noticed I can't get around it by building gazebo from source as the cmake config is hard-wired to reject Ogre above version 1.8.9.

Issue 996 is cited for the version restriction but there has been no activity on the issue since it was reported 5 months ago.
